title: Sara Jackson-Holman - River Queen EP  [MentalZero]
description:
Sara Jackson-Holman is an American singer-songwriter based in Portland, Oregon. She is a classically trained pianist. Her songs have been used in episodes of the television series Castle, Grey's Anatomy, Bones, 90210, and Orange Is The New Black.
 
Album Review: Sara Jackson-Holman - River Queen (Expunged Records) Source: wweek.com
